stepCustomization_desc: Maarch Courrier allows you to customize your application to integrate it perfectly into your work environment.

install_netcatOrNmap_desc: Utility for opening network connections (netcat / nmap)

stepPrerequisite_desc: Installing Maarch Courrier requires a number of prerequisites for installing PHP. For more information
install_unoconv_desc: Office soffice / unoconv document conversion tools installed
install_writable: Read and write permissions to the Maarch Courrier root directory
install_pdoPgsql_desc: PHP extension for connection to PostgreSQL databases
install_mbstring_desc: Extension PHP which provides multibyte specific string functions that help you deal with multibyte encodings in PHP.
install_fileinfo_desc: PHP extension trying to guess the content type and encoding of a file by looking for certain magic byte sequences at specific positions within the file.
install_gd_desc: PHP extension providing image manipulation, in a variety of formats, such as GIF, PNG, JPEG, WBMP and XPM.
install_imagick_desc: PHP extension to create and modify images, using the ImageMagick API.
install_imap_desc: PHP extension enable you to operate with the IMAP protocol, as well as the NNTP, POP3 and local mailbox access methods.
install_xsl_desc: PHP extension which implements the XSL standard, performing  XSLT transformations using the  libxslt library
install_gettext_desc: PHP extension allowing the implementation of the NLS (Native Language Support) API which can be used to internationalize your PHP applications.
install_xmlrpc_desc: PHP extension providing functions used to write XML-RPC servers and clients.
install_curl_desc: Tool to transfer data from or to a server, using some protocols

infoImportcontacts2: Empty values are not used by default when modifying contacts

stepDocserver_desc: Any storage system can be used, as long as it has a direct access "file system". This can be the case of a direct or indirect NFS type attachment to a SAN or NAS array, or for simple cases a set of RAID disks.
authorizedRoutesNotWellFormatted: The 'Allowed routes' field is not correctly formatted.

recordManagement_acknowledgementNotReada: The acknowledgment of receipt of this letter is not correctly structured
recordManagement_noAcknowledgementRefere: No acknowledgment of receipt found with the reference of this mail
recordManagement_wrongAcknowledgement: The acknowledgment of receipt is not linked to the correct mail
recordManagement_noReply: No forwarding response found for this mail
recordManagement_replyNotReadable: The forwarding response of this mail is not correctly structured
recordManagement_noReplyReference: No slip matches the transfer response
recordManagement_wrongReply: The forwarding response is not linked to the correct mail
noAccessRuleCode: No access rule defined (accessRuleCode in config.json)
noDestination: The courier has no processing entity

noTransferCopyNoBindingRecordManagement: Non-binding documents should not be sent to EAS
bindingMailDesc: A binding document involves a specific final action defined in the settings administration and is no longer linked to the document type.
noBindingMailDesc: A non-binding document involves a specific final action defined in the settings administration and is no longer linked to the document type.

errorUserSignType: Signers without a certificate must be present before signers with a certificate.
copyRootEntityAddress: Copy the first available parent address
refStatus: This document has been refused in the external signature
valStatus: This document has been validated in the external signature
stopStatus: This document has been interrupted in the external signature
nullStatus: The user has not yet taken any action
intermediateStatusMailing: The intermediate and error statuses are only used when mailing in the action
acountNotLinkedTomaarchParapheur: Your account is not linked to Maarch Parapheur
endStatus: This document was interrupted following a refusal action
lastNotSignatory: The last user in the workflow is not a signatory
workflowEndBySignatory: Workflow has to end with a Signatory
simpleConfirmWithUpdateDate: Confirmation and update of departure date
createAcknowledgementReceipt: Generate and send acknowledgments of receipt

sendToExternalSb: Send data to an external signature
sendToExternalNotebook: Send letters to be annotated to Maarch Parapheur
closeMailAndIndex: Close a mail and start indexing
closeMailWithAttachment: Close a mail with attachment or annotation
rejectionWorkflowPrevious: Refuse the visa - return to the previous viewfinder
savePrintRegisteredMail: Save and print the registered letter
saveIndexRegisteredMail: Save the recommended and start indexing
checkReplyRecordManagement: Verification of the response to the transfer of the electronic archiving system
checkAcknowledgmentRecordManagement: Verification of the transfer of the package to the electronic archiving system
redirectionDesc: Opens a modal allowing to choose a new dealing user OR to redefine the dealing service with a new mailing list
simpleConfirmDesc: Simply open a modal to confirm the action to be performed
closeMailDesc: Allows you to update the closing date of a mail. ESSENTIAL to complete your mail workflow
setPersistentModeOnDesc: Allows you to keep a mail in a bin regardless of its state. Insert the data in the table 'basket_persistent_mode'
setPersistentModeOffDesc: Resets the behavior of viewing mail in the bin. Delete the data in the 'basket_persistent_mode' table
markAsReadDesc: Mark mail as 'read' in the basket. Insert the data in the 'res_mark_as_read' table (useful if used in the bins clauses)
closeMailAndIndexDesc: Allows you to update the closing date of a mail AND opens the indexing page in order to record a new mail
closeMailWithAttachmentDesc: Allows you to update the closing date of a letter with the COMPULSORY presence of attachment (s) / annotation (s)
proceedWorkflowDesc: Updates the visa date of the current viewer / signer present in the mail visa workflow ('process_date' from the listinstance table)
interruptWorkflowDesc: Updates the visa date of the current viewer / signer and all subsequent viewers present in the mail visa path ('process_date' from the listinstance table). Also insert an interrupt message on the current viewer ('process_comment' from the listinstance table)
resetVisaWorkflowDesc: Resets the visa date of all viewers present in the mail visa workflow ('process_date' from the listinstance table)
rejectionWorkflowPreviousDesc: Resets the visa date of the previous finder present in the mail visa workflow ('process_date' from the listinstance table)
redirectWorkflowEntityDesc: Send the mail back to the initiating entity
sendToVisaDesc: Controls whether a visa workflow is configured AND whether one or more draft responses are associated with the mail
sendDocsToRecommendationDesc: Opens a modal allowing you to add or remove people in notice in the mailing list
validateRecommendationDesc: Allows you to add in the notice request annotation the person who checked the request
sendToAvisWfDesc: Opens a modal allowing you to configure a notification circuit for mail
proceedWorkflowAvisDesc: Updates the notification issue date of the current advisor in the notification circuit ('process_date' from the listinstance table)
proceedWorkflowAvisSimpleDesc: Updates the notification issue date of the user present in notification in the mail distribution list ('process_date' of the listinstance table)
reconcileResourceDesc: Adds the main mail file to another mail
chooseEntityAssociationContactGroup: Associate entities with the contact group
addCorrespondentInSharedGroupsOnProfile: Add correspondents in shared groups from the profile
mergeCorrespondentsGroupInfo: The following groups of correspondents will be merged
addNewCorrespondentsGroup: Add a new group of correspondents
searchForCorrespondentsGroupAssociation: Search for this term in the available correspondents

maarchUrlHelp: URL used in notifications and in documents synchronization with an external signature book

javaDesc: Default editor, requires the installation of java on your computer.
onlyofficeDesc: ONLYOFFICE provides a secure online office suite, highly compatible with MS Office formats.
collaboraonlineDesc: COLLABORA ONLINE is an open source online office suite developed by Collabora Productivity. It is based on LibreOffice Online .
shippingAuthUriDesc: Url for retrieving the token of the account used to use API resources
m2mUriDesc: Used as part of a direct connection between applications (same network)
m2mEmailDesc: Used as part of an indirect connection between applications (use of mailings for digital fold)
redirectToBasketAfterIndexing: Redirect to the basket after registration
m2mSection2: Receiving a digital mail via an external maarch application
setDefaultMetadata: Configure here the default metadata of the received mails.
maarch2maarchDesc:
The M2M functionality allows you to send mail and attachments between two instances of Maarch Courrier, or between Maarch Courrier and another GEC.
The data is transmitted in a ZIP archive either by sending an email (and Maarch Capture), or by REST web service, or manually ( more information ).
infoOutlookPlugin: Allows you via your mailbox to directly convert an email into mail in the application. (how to configure it?)
chrono_attachmentDesc: Allows you to generate a configurable character string via the chrono.xml file

signDurationCurrentUse: The shelf life (in days) cannot be negative
addinOutlookDesc: Send your emails to your GEC in 1 click.
addinOutlookSendDesc: Open the panel to perform actions for Maarch Courrier.
addinOutlookUnavailable: You cannot use the Outlook plugin because your Maarch Courrier application does not use https
addingOutlookMsg:
We will guide you through setting up the extension.
Please choose your environment
addingOutlookWebMsg1: From your outlook interface, click on " manage add-ins ":
addingOutlookWebMsg2: Then click on " " " Add from file ":
addingOutlookWebMsg4: Choose your previously downloaded manifest.xml file:
addingOutlookWebMsg6: Make sure the plugin is activated ():
addingOutlookWebMsg7:
That's it, your extension is operational!
When you consult a mail, you will have a new icon next to the response actions.
mustDeleteOtherTabsBeforeSendMassMode: Please remove other PJ tabs before switching to direct mail .
outlookSendingModuleDesc: Configure the indexing model and the document type used when converting emails to emails

We need to store your password * for your outlook account in order to retrieve the attachments associated with the emails you inject into the application.
(You can skip this step if you don't need to retrieve email attachments)
addingOutlookPasswordMsg2: * The password will be used ONLY by this application and will not transit over the network
